body: I clicked the random button and i ended up here, i must say im very impressed
more people should know this. nice. and i don't really mind the last chapter, even if it's not as good as the other ones. this is amazing shit.

Page 139, so actually Adachi had sex with Mitchuru's husband too?? Strange that this was not adressed in page 161, where two of them is complaining about her behaviour? 

It was long read, but I wouldn't mind to get another 180 pages continuing this story!
this could convert an atheist into a believer
Yeah i agree, the last chapter was pretty disappointing. It didn't fit the whole whore-aspect that they had going on the entire time. Would've been better if it ended with an orgy.
idc about the story tbh, just looking some stuff to jack hahaha
Take a shot every time they say "anal sex"

Agreed with what @tester1337 is saying, that last chapter is a fucking mess. Why the fuck is that generic glasses boy even exist anyway and why the fuck he suddenly in a middle of a harem.

Fuck the author, that last chaptet ruin everything.

The author kinda failed with ending, i mean the cheating part of that girl who's married, Tsuhiko or whatever was her name. I'm not being a vanilla fag here, just her sudden character flow change gave me a cringe, so dislogical. Obviously author got inspired by "Sex and the City" show, but if you're copying, why don't copy it all according to original? If you wanted to make her a character different apart from origins, then explain it earlier, do a proper development, shouldn't show her all that vanilla and naive but "easy to go" girl too that fits their "anal whorish club".
Whatever, i forgot it's just a porn for a second, lul.
